name: Fall-o-rama
description:
The game uses a minimalist mechanic in which the character is in free fall and must avoid colliding with obstacles.

A single shock can cause the game to end.

The objective is to stay in the fall for as long as possible.

Game developed for the 10th edition of Game Jam Goiânia, an event concomitant with Ludum Dare 50.

Developed by Z3R0 Games Developer together with

Marih (Twitter: @MarihSenju), 

Marcos Zhao (Instagram: @zhaoryuu), 

Nicolau Chaud (Itch.io: calunio | Twitter: @thecalunio).

Contact: z3r00gd@gmail.com
